Summary: Orange yellow object Moving NE to SW
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Fargo
There were no other sightings in Fargo on or around June 29th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsThree of us were sitting out at a fire pit and I noticed an orange object in the sky. I noticed it because it wasn't pulsating but coming closer. When I alerted the two other people with me, we all stood up and watched it move from a straight path to a zig zag pattern. It first came in straight from the north east and then moved to a south west pattern. While doing so, it made some zig zags while still moving. It's color was orange and solid. Nothing was pulsating like a plane.
